name: Nyanpocalypse
description:
Snake multiplayer with Nyancats instead of snakes.

Up to 8 players loacally, Keys are displayed on the top of the screen.

Use your Rainbow to kill other Nyancats, get points when other Nyans are killed!

Created by:

Krzysztof "Raptor" Taperek
Piotr "Zombie" Chodun
